productName: DCP-L3551CDW : Wireless Colour LED 3-in-One, Duplex Mobile Print ADF Colour LED Multi-Function Centre with Wireless & Network Connectivity, Automatic 2-sided Colour Print, ADF - Multi-page Scan & Copy, High Productivity with Fast Print Speeds, Wi-Fi Direct, Mobile & USB Print, Low Cost Quality Print Resolution with Affordable Toner
description:
A4 print speed up to 18 ppm (Black/Colour)
WiFi, AirPrint, Mopria, WiFi Direct, LAN, USB 2.0
Auto 2-sided (Duplex) printing, 50 sheets Auto-Document Feeder (ADF), 2-line LCD, Security Features, 512 MB Memory, 250 Sheets Paper Tray
Full capacity toner included. Yield up to 1000/1000 pages (black/colour)*
Compatible with Brother iPrint&Scan Mobile App** & BR Admin**
1 Year on-site warranty included
